title: Sudden Drop In Frames

embed.description: The latest ROG gaming laptop - the G752 - showcases the evolution of the brand, with a revolutionary design finished in a new Armor Titanium and Plasma Copper color scheme. With Windows 10, a 6th-generation Intel® Skylake Core™ i7 processor, up to 64GB DDR4 RAM, and the latest NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX™ graphics, ROG G752 delivers exceptional gaming performance.

body: I have had this gaming laptop for about 3 months. It has been amazing and I get around 250 fps on medium settings. But, a few days ago i could only get 25 too 35 fps. I have no idea why. Please help, Thank You so much.

replies.body:
Ooh, that's a pretty beefy laptop! It should definitely be pushing out more FPS than you're getting at the moment. Let's work together to ensure that you're knocking down towers and landing that epic baron steal at the best FPS possible.

I'd like you to work through our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting), as it covers the most common solutions for situations like this such as updating your display drivers and configuring your windows power settings. Let me know if those steps cause any observable change for you, afterward.

Hmm.. since you're on Windows 10, be sure you've disabled the Windows Game Bar. The Anniversary update to Windows 10 pushed out the *Game DVR* feature into the Game Bar and has been causing FPS issues and game crashes for some players.

Let me know if that helped at all.

I noticed that i get my normal 250 fps. But, that only happened a few time during the game. For the most part i got 25 fps during the game. So there was little improvement.

Thank you!

If you'd like us to further troubleshoot this to get everything completely back to normal, I'd recommend running a set of system logs with our [HRT App](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

One of our tech specialists will be happy to take it from here.
